hero.title: xMatix Field Sales
hero.description1: Plan routes. Execute consistently. Close with confidence.
hero.description2:
xMatix Field Sales helps teams plan routes, execute store visits, capture orders, and enforce execution standards in real time. 
 Every visit follows a governed workflow that is measurable, auditable, and outcome driven

cardsData.title: The Problem
cardsData.content: Most field sales teams struggle with missed visits, inconsistent execution, manual reporting, and limited visibility into what actually happens on the ground.
list: Outcomes depend on individuals, not systems

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix Field Sales standardizes how sales visits are planned, executed, and tracked so every visit follows the same process and produces reliable outcomes.

keyCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
keyCapabilities.description2: xMatix Field Sales modernizes field execution without replacing your CRM or ERP while delivering faster execution, governed adaptability, and measurable outcomes.

cardsData.title: End to End Visit Execution
cardsData.description: Design and run standardized sales visit workflows from route planning to order capture and follow up.

cardsData.title: Policy and Approval Enforcement
cardsData.description: Ensure pricing, discounts, schemes, and credit rules are enforced automatically during execution.

cardsData.title: Real Time Visibility and Data Capture
cardsData.description: Capture orders, inventory signals, photos, and compliance data with instant synchronization across systems.

cardsData.title: No Code Process Changes
cardsData.description: Adapt visit flows, validations, and rules without code and respond faster to market changes.

cardsData.title: Human and System Action Orchestration
cardsData.description: Coordinate representative actions, system updates, and approvals across CRM, ERP, and downstream systems.

requestADemo.heading: See xMatix Field Sales in Action
requestADemo.subHeading: Execute lead to cash with confidence
requestADemo.description: Standardize field execution, improve visit productivity, and gain real visibility into sales outcomes without disrupting existing systems.
